name: Jewel Legends - Bloodmoon
description:
Rebuild the mystical, ruined village of Wolfsbach in the match-3 adventure “Jewel Legends - Bloodmoon”!

The people of the tranquil village of Wolfsbach once lived in peace and prosperity until abominable werewolves destroyed the sleepy village in increasingly brutal attacks. Only a legendary order of werewolf hunters has the courage and the power to stand up to these monsters. Lead the order, battle the werewolves and protect the villagers while fending off the beasts’ constant attacks.

Rebuild the village and bring back hope and peace to its inhabitants! Collect jewels, diamonds, treasures and resources by creating chains of three or more matching symbols. Do this to rebuild the ruined buildings and defenses, and pimp up the village according to your wishes. But beware: the werewolves are lurking and planning their next attack!

Features:
• A new game in the popular match-3 series
• Over 100 levels and 9 mystical tools
• Construct magnificent buildings like the alchemy laboratory
• Fend off attacks from the savage werewolves
• Pimp up the village according to your wishes
